mdRecord.dcterms:title: Dactylography, Faulds ad; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 1. Historical InformationFaulds, Henry (Flyers for publications of Faulds, a speech transcript given by Faulds from the 11th Annual IAI Conference, and two copies of his book, A Manual of Practical Dactylography.)Printed flyer. "Dactylography" at the top. An advertisement with critic quotes for Faulds's publication. Also includes his address and the publisher. See also item 010-139.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Faulds, Henry, 18431930
